title: MySQL TEXT type size limit
extract: TINYTEXT is a string data type that can store up to to 255 characters. TEXT is a string data type that can store up to 65,535 characters. TEXT is commonly used for storing blocks of text such as the body of an article. MEDIUMTEXT is a string data type with a maximum length of 16,777,215 characters.May 8, 2009
extract_html: TINYTEXT is a string data type that can store up to to 255 characters. TEXT is a string data type that can store up to 65,535 characters. TEXT is commonly used for storing blocks of text such as the body of an article. MEDIUMTEXT is a string data type with a maximum length of 16,777,215 characters.May 8, 2009
